recipesJson.name: Pink Hell
recipesJson.author: Borninfire138
recipesJson.description:
A simple, bright pink guava for those who demand something different. 

Sweet guava is the star, flavorah pink guava ensures you get that message. Sweet strawberry fills out the mid notes and lemon lime brightens it up. Optional sweetener raises everything to a higher level. 

Enjoy. Born.

reviews.text: I'm very taken with this recipe. Simple but the use of FLV Pink Guava is excellent. While the CAP flavours are sweet and bubbly the FLV Guava gives it this tangier, true-citrus top note that has grapefruity vibes without the bitterness. Love it.
Holy holy guava! You want guava? You got it! Seriously though this is a great well balenced recipe here. Frankly I don't think it needs any SS. Well done sir.
